subject: Supreme Court of Florida
body:
Supreme Court of Florida
Address: 500 S Duval St, Tallahassee, FL 32399, United States
Phone: +1 904-585-4972
Email: 
supremefloridacourt347@aol.com
FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF FLORIDA,UNITED STATES.
Dear customer,
I am Chief Judge,Supreme Court of Florida,We the Supreme Court of Florida write this today to announce to you that the total sum of $1,350,000 USA Dollars is under our Care for Security purpose.
which Mrs Doris Woolwine stated that you assigned her to received as your next kin due to you were on sick bed so she sent a power of attorney stated that you are on a chronic sick bed because of a fatal accident you had and made a request that you authorized her to received your funds.here are the address tendered to us below:
9009 SE Causey Ave Apt G 34
Happy Valley,  Oregon 97086 USA
Phone #  +1 503 878-1835
We will advise you to purchase Us$25 Google pay or Us$25 iTunes gift card and send it today or within 48 hours so that we will redeem it to cash and you will get your ATM Master Card.
please get back to us immediately if you are not aware of this request with your delivery information: 1.Your Full Name: 2. Address Where You want us to your ATM Master Card! 3. Cell/Mobile Number: 4. 
Your ID
.
we strive to ensure that you will always receive prompt and courteous attention.
Yours in Services
Chief Judge.Hushemui S. Buckner
Email: 
supremefloridacourt347@aol.com
Call or text message: +1 904-585-4972

subject: Re: Supreme Court of Florida
body:
Dear Chief S. Buckner,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Supreme Court of Florida. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the security of my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with any transactions.

1. Can you please provide more details about the specific amount of money that is under your care? It would be helpful to know the exact sum involved.

2. Who is Mrs. Doris Woolwine and how is she related to me? I don't recall assigning anyone to receive funds on my behalf, so I would like some clarification on this matter.

3. Could you explain why purchasing a US Google Pay or US gift card is necessary for redeeming my ATM Master Card? What purpose does it serve?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with this matter.

Best wishes,
Nicolas
